Package it.polimi.se2019.limperio.nicotera.italia.controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CatchController
    This class handles all of the operations concerning the catch actions of the players
    Controller
    Class for checking the correctness of the action of the players, according to MVC pattern
    DeathController
    Controller that handles the deaths of the players.
    InvolvedPlayer
    Structure that store a player and square involved in an action like shoot or use of some powerUp cards
    PowerUpController
    This class handles the draught, the discard and the use of a power up card by a player
    ReloadController
    Handles the reload action of a player, checking if he can reload and the way to pay the price to reload his weapons.
    RoundController
    Controller that handles all of the operations to complete the turn and pass to successive one.
    RunController
    This class handles the run action by a player and checks where it can move to.
    ShootController
    Controller that checks the correct development of the shoot action.
    TerminatorController
    Controller that is dedicated to the actions of the terminator and is correctness.
    WeaponController
    Controller used to check the usability of weapons.
